casebody.data:
REAL ESTATE DE LOUISIANE, INC.
v.
ALLEN/LABORDE No. 2018-C-1108 Supreme Court of Louisiana. October 15, 2018 ON WRIT OF CERTIORARI TO THE COURT OF APPEAL, THIRD CIRCUIT, PARISH OF ST. LANDRY Writ denied. HUGHES, J., concurs and assigns reasons. I concur in the writ denial. The only entity that would benefit under the facts presented is the real estate agency, which has not been made a party defendant.
